ofx:section.ofx:title: OS Ticket
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: OS Ticket is an open source support ticket system with as many features and tools as most of the commercial support ticket systems.

After your Debian base and MySQL installation, osticket needs some requirements: First of all, you need to update the system files In addition to the MySql Server and Client, we need a Plug-In for PHP5. Finally we need to install PHP5.

ofx:listing.ofx:raw: apt-get update apt-get install mysql-client apt-get install php5 apt-get install php5-mysqlnd

ofx:section.ofx:paragraph:
In addition to the pre-requirements, osticket needs some pre-configuration before the installation:
Go to your osticket installation destination and execute the following lines.
After these steps, osticket is available and ready for the installation under following address:

ofx:listing.ofx:raw: cp /include/ost-sampleconfig.php /include/ost-config.php chmod 0666 /include/ost-config.php ln -s var/www/osticket x.x.x/upload var/www/tickets

ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: Configuration of osticket... URL xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx/tickets XXX
